net.canarymod.bansystem

Class Ban

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.canarymod.bansystem.Ban

  • public class Ban
extends java.lang.Object
    Contains information regarding a ban
    Author:
    Chris Ksoll (damagefilter), Jason Jones (darkdiplomat)

      • getSubject

        public java.lang.String getSubject()
        Get the banned subject (usually a player name)
        Returns:
        subject name

      • setSubject

        public void setSubject(java.lang.String subject)
        Set the banned Subject (usually a player name)
        Parameters:
        subject - the subject's name

      • getIp

        public java.lang.String getIp()
        If this is an IP ban, you can get the IP address here
        Returns:
        the ip address or null if this is not an ip ban

      • setIp

        public void setIp(java.lang.String ip)
        If this is an IP Ban, set the IP address
        Parameters:
        ip - the ip address

      • getReason

        public java.lang.String getReason()
        Get the banning reasons. It defaults to the funny reason of "Impersonating fictive characters"
        Returns:
        the ban reason

      • setReason

        public void setReason(java.lang.String reason)
        Set the ban reason
        Parameters:
        reason - the ban reason

      • getTimestamp

        @Deprecated
public long getTimestamp()
        Deprecated. Use getExpiration() instead
        Get the UNIX timestamp of when this ban will expire. You can use that with a date formatter if you need to.
        Returns:
        UNIX timestamp

      • getExpiration

        public long getExpiration()
        Get the UNIX timestamp of when this ban will expire. You can use that with a date formatter if you need to.
        Returns:
        UNIX timestamp

      • isExpired

        public boolean isExpired()
        Check if this ban has expired
        Returns:
        true if expired; false if not

      • isIpBan

        public boolean isIpBan()
        Checks if the Ban is an IP Ban
        Returns:
        true if IP Ban; false if not

      • setIsIpBan

        public void setIsIpBan(boolean isIpBan)
        Sets if the Ban is an IP Ban
        Parameters:
